title: Prepare test_autograd.py for introduction of scalars
body_html:
Distinguish between a few usages of scalar in test_autograd:

  1. scalar -> pyscalar when referring to a python number
  2. scalar -> 1_element when referring to size {1} tensor
  3. () -> NO_ARGS when specifying no arguments to a function instead of a size, since () is now the size of a scalar

Also removes some dead code from when mul_(...) only worked on tensors.

body:
Distinguish between a few usages of scalar in test_autograd:
1) scalar -> pyscalar when referring to a python number
2) scalar -> 1_element when referring to size {1} tensor
3) () -> NO_ARGS when specifying no arguments to a function instead of a size, since () is now the size of a scalar

Also removes some dead code from when mul_(...) only worked on tensors.
